content.html: It is sickening that Apple is relying on crowd funding to make Safari more accessible. To be clear: It’s good that :focus-visible is being worked on at all, but I cannot be happy that the *world’s richest company* cannot find $35k to do it themselves. igalia.com/open-prioritiz…
content.value:
It is sickening that Apple is relying on crowd funding to make Safari more accessible.

To be clear: It’s good that :focus-visible is being worked on at all, but I cannot be happy that the *world’s richest company* cannot find $35k to do it themselves.

igalia.com/open-prioritiz…
